name: Computer Beach
description:
We believe that everyone should have the opportunity to escape their surroundings. Many people want the mental health benefits and increased sense of well-being associated with practicing mindfulness and meditation, but there is a steep learning curve. Fortunately, with the proliferation of Virtual Reality and affordable computing power, anyone with a smart phone can achieve a calmer mental state.

Computer Beach challenges and elevates the medium of 360 video by rejecting realism and emphasizing escapism. By combining the aesthetic of VHS-style "glitch" art, Vaporwave/Psychedelic culture and looping footage of a gorgeous beach in Martha's Vineyard, we cultivate a hypnotic and transformative experience and make it available to everyone.
